entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix NRT annotations on `XmlProcessingInstruction` #71862
  • Async capability when using `ConfigurePrimaryHttpMessageHandler` to configure certificates #71861
  • XmlElement's constructor should have a nullable `prefix` parameter #71858
  • Emulated x86 and x64 .NET 7 on ARM64 can't create new project #71856
  • [Mono] `Task.Wait` does not respect `SynchronizationContext.IsWaitNotificationRequired` under certain circumstances, leading to deadlocks #71855
  • [wasm] Linker crashing with `System.NotImplementedException: switch` #71848
  • BEGIN_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH mechanism for `corelib.h` does not work with nested classes #71847
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Tests randomly failing because the results xml was empty #71843
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Testing.Tests crashed: Fatal error. Internal CLR error. #71841
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `v8` crashing with AOT on perf pipeline #71840
    7.0.0
  • Updating lclmorph to support bitcast #71839
  • [wasm] STJ.Serialization.Tests failing with `System.NotSupportedException` with AOT #71838
  • Obsolete no-op members on ServicePointManager #71836
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Ioc can load configuration from config file #71832
  • `IsMultiRegNode` on ARM assumes all `BITCAST`s are multi-reg #71831
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add another entry to JsonNumberHandling to serialize long/ulong as strings #71830
  • [API Proposal]: Nullable<T> special casing for interpolated string handlers #71828
  • mTLS handshake not working on Linux from .NET 5.0.15/6.0.x #71825
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Options.dll cannot be AoT compiled for Android 31.0 #71817
  • Math.BigMul(ulong a, ulong b, out ulong low) uses SoftwareFallback even though Bmi2.X64.IsSupported. #71816
  • C++/CLR IJwhost.dll Exception on windows server 2012 (works on Win 10) #71812
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/refany/virtcall_do/virtcall_do.cmd #71806
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Improve RateLimiter metrics #71804

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add back `ObsoletedInOSPlatformAttribute` for .NET 7 #68557
    7.0.0
  • gcenv.interlocked's Interlocked use full memory barriers even with 8.1 Atomics #67824
    7.0.0
  • RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops / StressTestDeepNestingOfConcat tests stack overflowing #71808
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M09.5-PDC\\b12274\\b12274\\b12274.cmd #59689
    7.0.0
  • I can't create new bitmap. #71818
  • TypeSystem: Support Virtual Static Methods, not just abstract static methods #65324
    7.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails after generating ILCompiler.ReadyToRun.ni.dll on armel with --inputbubble #48466
    7.0.0
  • Add support for R2R tail calls with helpers in crossgen/crossgen2 #35423
    7.0.0
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Compiles.ValidateSnippetsFallbackForwarder(id: \"\\nusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;\\npartial c\"..., source: Net, targetFramework: True, expectFallbackForwarder: ???) #71810
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_57606\\Runtime_57606\\Runtime_57606.cmd #71805
  • Fix GC/API/WeakReference/Finalize2 to be more robust #8158
    7.0.0
  • Importer's spilling logic for `stfld` is not correct #71638
    8.0.0
  • Re-enable the assembly level attribute portions of src/tests/reflection/GenericAttribute/GenericAttributeTests.cs #56880
    7.0.0
  • Higher CPU usage since update from 5.0.13 to 6.0.1+ #66827
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Random uncaught js exceptions in `System.Security.Cryptography.Tests` on the browser #70856
  • [wasm] Random `Uncaught Error: Assert failed: subtle crypto not initialized` in `WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests` #70858
  • [API Proposal]: New interface to allow manual processing of a `SynchronizationContext` #71823
  • Question: how to bind a Dictionary in an Options class? #71736
  • How to properly set umask in TarEntry and ZipFileExtensions #69760
    7.0.0
  • Queations about Mono.Data.Sqlite encryption #71811
  • Test failure: Interop\\IJW\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #70791
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make [*]InterpolatedStringHandler implementations usable in user libraries #71829
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70135
    7.0.0
  • Blazor .NET 6 with Native Dependency cannot build without administrator permission. #63923
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M12-Beta2\\b79250\\b79250\\b79250.cmd #71748
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_42732/test42732/test42732.sh #71815
  • AppDomain.MonitoringSurvivedMemorySize incorrect in .NET 5.0 #45446
    7.0.0
  • Windows x86 JIT build not minimal #44039
    7.0.0
  • Test failure SampleSynthesisTests.SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechRecognitionEngineProperties #60239
  • Microsoft.Win32: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48938
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.EventLog: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48940
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48939
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48941
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48942
  • System.Management: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48944
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48943
    7.0.0
  • System.ServiceProcess: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48945
  • DependencyModel: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48946
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-Configuration: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48948
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-Caching: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48947
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-DependencyInjection: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48949
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-Hosting: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48950
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-Logging: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48951
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-Options: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48952
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-Primitives: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48953
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48955
    7.0.0
  • System.ComponentModel: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48954
    7.0.0
  • System.Drawing: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48956
    7.0.0
  • Extensions-FileSystem: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48958
    7.0.0
  • System.Globalization: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48957
    7.0.0
  • System.Console: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48959
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48960
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Compression: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48962
    7.0.0
  • System.IO: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48961
    7.0.0
  • System.Linq.Parallel: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48963
    7.0.0
  • System.Memory: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48964
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Channels: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48965
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48966
    7.0.0
  • [mono wasm] Passing arguments to entry point not working #61145
  • System.Buffers: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48967
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48968
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48969
    Future
  • System.Runtime: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48970
    Future
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48972
    Future
  • Revisit locking in SymbolicRegexBuilder #70753
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48998
    Future
  • System.Transactions: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48997
  • System.ServiceModel.Syndication: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48996
  • System.Data: Backport MS Docs documentation to triple slash #48994
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • createdump improvements for better VS4Mac Watson bucketing #71863
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix annotation on XmlElement constructor parameter #71860
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use HashCode.Combine instead of ValueTuple.GetHashCode in MatchingState #71859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update upstream ref for arm fp unwind support #71857
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid SafeHandle finalization from failed registry operations #71854
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Temporarily exclude NativeAOT from source-build until we figure out how to handle it #71853
  • Moved call to TryLoadGenericMetaTypeNullability #71851
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Update string marshallers to V2 shape #71849
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Handle unary operator GT_CNEG_LT in few code paths #71845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always poison arrays allocated with GC_ALLOC_ZEROING_OPTIONAL #71835
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed duplicated testcases as a follow-up for #70560 #71827
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enabled `System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.Tests`. #71821
    arch-wasm, area-System.ComponentModel
  • Do not throw BadImageFormat from the type system #71820
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Rebucket tests that fail with NativeAOT and fix some #71819
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • tasks/Utils.cs: Add support for logging errors/warnings from process #71814
    area-Build-mono
  • Bump TraceEventVersion to 3.0.3 #71813
    NO-MERGE
  • [wasm][aot] Make the gc pin area smaller. #71807
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Make MetadataReader.GetAssemblyName(string assemblyFile) public #71801
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Updating the Generic Math to match final API review feedback #71800
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][aot] Avoid making the 'this' variable volatile. #71799
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use UnrelatedR2RCode flag when --compilebubblegenerics is specified #71798
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64String #71795

Merged

  • Add basic regression testing for .NET 6 source generated JsonSerializerContext. #71850
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add/implement ObsoletedInOSPlatformAttribute. #71846
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix more warnings from updated IDE rules #71779
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Disable several outerloop Regex tests stack overflowing #71809
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix stack overflow from start set calculation #71842
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Update MonoAOTCompiler to provide reference assemblies location #71787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Always expand "obj is ExactClass" even in cold blocks #71739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing APIs to contract customization #71797
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Less aggressive `stfld` spilling #71663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check for V2 shapes on array marshallers #71796
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update Compiles.cs #71837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Disable Runtime_57606 on win-arm32 #71844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix events for V8 #71834
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable test now that the msbuild fix has propagated #71745
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Tar, Zip: respect umask when creating files. #71647
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Tar: for directories, use a default mask that has the 'x' bit. #71760
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations when using DataContractSerializer with SurrogateTypes #70620
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Make sure the struct field offset matches with that of parent during morphing #71792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use file-scoped types in RegexGenerator output #71765
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Enable direct decomposition of promoted args on ARM #71780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the zero-offset field sequence map #71455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove some fgWalkTree uses #71767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle GTF_REVERSE_OPS in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv #71759
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect generic recursion pattern in S.Linq.Parallel #71802
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete invalid GVM analysis optimization #71803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support stateful linear collection marshalling #71788
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Propagate typeof() during inlining #71778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] JSImport and JSExport code gen #71551
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fixed issue #71641 #71671
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move _OOP_find_proc_info to libunwind #71465
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Finds logger field in related types #71308
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Describe the validity of null managed pointers #71794
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] API QuicConnection #71783
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] API QuicListener #71579
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #71652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Use u8 string in CultureNames #71417
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Provide upgrade response details #71757
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable Rfc2898DeriveBytes on Browser WASM #71768
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Generics support in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #71619
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #69020
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM #71598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Log as error in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70865
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 6.0.8
